feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: #16028 Org Settings - SEOIndexing,Disable Org Url by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16075
  • fix: bulk attribute assignment by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17896
  • build: Reduce bundle size from unnecessary bundeling react/jsx-runtime in embed-react package by @KlotzJesse in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17790
  • fix: Added proper updates/interactivity on the "Getting started" app integâ€¦ by @itsalam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17903
  • fix : Issue on docs by @askadityapandey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17895
  • feat: show attributes in profile by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17920
  • fix: Broken integration test due to month change by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17949
  • feat: no show guests on insights by @VK-RED in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17919
  • fix: UI regression related to DataTable by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17943
  • fix: Meeting URL does not save when changing the location to Gmeet or any static app by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17840
  • fix: refactor OG link builder by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17897
  • chore: Extract some refactor work from util.ts to improve error handling by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17912
  • fix: navigation items weird behavior by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17929
  • fix: /members improvements by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17911
  • fix: host entry not created when user added to team in org by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17927
  • feat: routing form table merge columns by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17938
  • fix: Display option label in the routing form response email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17898
  • feat: Show add to calendar section for customers after booking an event by @coder-adnan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17761
  • fix: ai translations description for atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17875
  • chore: fixed colored event margin by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17932
  • fix: fix date comparison for OOO by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17756
  • fix: Date Range Picker behavior by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17914
  • chore: Reduce org banner height on mobile booker by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17954

New Contributors

  • @KlotzJesse made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17790
  • @coder-adnan made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17761

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.14...v4.7.15

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: brand colors set by user not respected in embed by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17399
  • test: fix organisation settings e2e by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17957
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17952
  • fix: Revert "merge columns (#17938)" by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17960
  • feat: return participants by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17950
  • fix: change case for column size vars by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17961
  • feat: Salesforce - add option to ignore guests by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17956
  • fix: remove platform and console submodule by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17939
  • fix: build failure for v4.7.15 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17968
  • chore: safeMarkdown by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17972
  • fix: org bio by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17971
  • chore: use markdownToSafeHTML in EventMeta by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17975
  • docs: v2 rolling window and authentication by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17825
  • fix: Remove user from managed event type when removing from org by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17369
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17965
  • fix: handling of defaultLabel by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17976

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.15...v4.7.16

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: watchlist by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17947
  • fix: z index hover card on routing form responses by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17981
  • fix: remove duplicate headers in attribute pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17985
  • feat: Salesforce - search for account ownership based on website by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17989
  • fix: trying to update the timeFormat throws error by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17991
  • chore: add Replexica env to ci tests by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17970
  • refactor: v2 OAuth webhooks & workflows by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17959
  • fix: disable mandatory reminder for platform by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17998
  • feat: add assignment reason to routing insights by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17984
  • feat: fetch SEO data for booking pages in server by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17987
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18000
  • chore: don't show the parent managed eventType as event redirection option by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17993
  • chore: Move pre-commit commands to pre-push by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17996
  • style: rename [...nextauth].tsx to use .ts file extention by @rajdeep-ghosh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17992
  • chore: enable eslint rule react/no-danger by @chribjel in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17983
  • fix: data loading state by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18002
  • chore: settings/developer - remove pages router and use app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16794
  • revert: "chore: Move pre-commit commands to pre-push (#17996)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18009
  • chore: settings/teams and settings/billing - remove pages router and use app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16751

New Contributors

  • @rajdeep-ghosh made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17992
  • @chribjel made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17983

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.16...v4.7.17

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: named export / default export same time by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18012
  • fix: fetching event-types of org users apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18004
  • fix: custom implem markdownToSafeHTML for platform by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18018
  • feat: Add slotFormat query parameter to slots API V2 endpoint to return start and end time of a slot by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17873
  • fix: localStorage not found for Booker atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18014
  • fix: Don't force reschedule with same RR host if reschedule is actually rerouting by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17511
  • fix: days of the week in different language in the workflow by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17850
  • feat: refactor filters on insights response table by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17796
  • feat: prevent rescheduling past bookings by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18003
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18022

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.17...v4.7.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: drop sourceLang, targetLang and id columns by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17792
  • revert: "feat: refactor filters on insights response table (#17796)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18024
  • chore: technical debt - remove unused files by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18025
  • feat: Webhook support for Managed Events by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17986
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18033
  • feat: Reduce bundle size via better imports + install gcal + gvideo by default for google signups by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17810
  • chore: technical debt - remove instances of testing /future routes by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18032

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.18...v4.7.19
